Question: In which movie did Hilary Duff join the cast, released in 2019?
Options:
A. A) The Haunting of Sharon Tate
B. B) Lizzie McGuire's Other Movie
C. C) The Lizzie McGuire Movie
D. D) The Perfect Man
Answer: A) The Haunting of Sharon Tate
